H0.text: It is designed to move with a motor is the statement that best describes a complex machine.

H1.text: It is constructed from machineâ€‘made parts is the best statement that describes a complex machine.

H2.text: The best description of a complex machine is that it is made of more than one simple machine.

H3.text: It is built from more than one type of material is the best description of a complex machine.

A4.text: A compound machine is formed from a set of simple machines connected in series with the output force of one providing the input force to the next.

A5.text: The mechanical advantage of a compound machine is just the product of the mechanical advantages of the simple machines of which it is composed.
